thread.title: Drone video shows huge destruction near Damascus
thread.title_full: Drone video shows huge destruction near Damascus | News24

author: news24.com
title: Drone video shows huge destruction near Damascus
text:
Beirut - A video of a Damascus neighbourhood filmed by a Russian drone has provided a rare glimpse into the staggering scale of destruction that years of fighting has inflicted around the Syrian capital, the seat of President Bashar Assad's power.
The video shot over the district of Jobar by RTR war correspondent Yevgeny Poddubny on October 18 and obtained by The Associated Press on Thursday shows blocks of bombed-out residential buildings, most of them with gaping holes and others with their top floors collapsed.
Mushrooms of thick gray smoke billow out as targets are blasted, presumably by Syrian warplanes.
Entrenched for years
